title: 最新页面
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:nav-generic-css]]
[[module CSS]]
.feature {
    --box-accent: #708192;
    border: 0.25rem solid;
    border-image: linear-gradient(186deg, #d2e2ec, #96acb7) 8;
}
.feature .content-type-description > div {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    grid-gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.5rem;
}
.feature .content-type-description > div > div {
    flex-basis: max(30.5%, 8.25rem);
    flex-grow: 1;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0.25rem;
}

#u-other .wiki-content-table td:nth-child(3) {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 0.875em;
    width: 5.5rem;
}

#u-other .wiki-content-table td:nth-child(3) a:not([href$=admin],[href$=hub],[href$=contest],[href$=workbench],[href$=supplement],[href$=site],[href$=guide],[href$=essay],[href$=news],[href$=resource],[href$=author],[href$=component],[href$=component-backend],[href*=theme],[href$=more-by],[href$=splash],[href$=redirect]){
    display: none;
}


[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:earthworm
| first=false | last=false | hub=yes
| previous-url=https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/shortest-pages-this-month | previous-title=最短页面
| next-url=https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/top-rated-pages-this-month | next-title=最高分页面
| hub-url=/ | hub-title=最新页面
]]

= 若想参阅所有新建页面的单一列表，请阅览[[[most-recently-created|]]]。

[!--
[[div class="content-box feature" id="rewrite"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Recent Rewrite Entries
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages tags="+rewrite -admin" perPage="6" limit="6" order="created_at desc" separate="false"]]
[[div_]]
%%title_linked%%
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[Articles Eligible for Rewrite]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

------
--]

[[div class="content-grid"]]

[!-- SCP Block --]

[[div class="content-box" id="scp"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
最新的翻译SCP
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages tags="+scp -原创" order="created_at desc" separate="false" category="_default adult" perPage="12" limit="60" urlAttrPrefix="scp" prependLine="||~ 页面 ||~ [[size 0%]]创建日期[[/size]]📆︎ ||~ [[size 0%]]评论[[/size]]💬︎ ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-box" id="scp"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
最新的原创SCP
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">=-2" tags="+scp +原创" order="created_at desc" separate="false" category="_default adult" perPage="12" limit="60" urlAttrPrefix="scp-cn" prependLine="||~ 页面 ||~ [[size 0%]]创建日期[[/size]]📆︎ ||~ [[size 0%]]评论[[/size]]💬︎ ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Tale Block --]

[[div class="content-box tale" id="tale"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
最新的翻译故事
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages tags="故事 -原创" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="12" limit="60" category="*" urlAttrPrefix="tale" prependLine="||~ 页面 ||~ [[size 0%]]创建日期[[/size]]📆︎ ||~ [[size 0%]]评论[[/size]]💬︎ ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[foundation-tales|]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-box tale" id="tale"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
最新的原创故事
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">=-2" tags="故事 +原创" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="12" limit="60" category="*" urlAttrPrefix="tale-cn" prependLine="||~ 页面 ||~ [[size 0%]]创建日期[[/size]]📆︎ ||~ [[size 0%]]评论[[/size]]💬︎ ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||

[!-- GoI Format Block --]

最新的翻译GoI格式
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages tags="goi格式 -原创" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="8" limit="40" category="*" urlAttrPrefix="goi" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]📆︎ ||~ [[size 0%]]Comments[[/size]]💬︎ ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[goi-formats|]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[!-- Other Block --]

[[div class="content-box alt" id="other"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
